name: write_note
body: let metas = vec ! [AccountMeta :: new (ctx . accounts . log_cell . key () , false) , AccountMeta :: new_readonly (ctx . accounts . user . key () , false) ,] ;
let ix = Instruction { program_id : LOG_PROGRAM_ID , accounts : metas , data } ;
invoke (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . log_hint . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . log_cell . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () ,] ,) ? ;
